Room.Name: Venus Gardens Plant Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a warm and sticky greenhouse where lots of plants are growing.
Room.LongDescription: The Venus Gardens are known for their carniverous plants. Unfortunately, the plants have seemed to gain some intelligence and have overpowered the shoppe owners. The store is now run by very large venus fly traps and lillianril, waiting for some unsuspecting victim to come in and feed them. There is a porch outside where some of the larger plants are basking in the sun.
